workflow.name: Automated customer feedback analysis & response with Jotform, GPT-4.1 & Google Sheets
workflow.description:
## AI-powered feedback analysis and response automation from Jotform to Google Sheets and Slack

### Who‚Äôs it for  
Businesses using **Jotform** to collect customer feedback who want to automate sentiment analysis, email responses, and internal reporting ‚Äî especially **eCommerce**, **support**, or **CX teams** looking to scale without hiring more agents.

---

### How it works  
This workflow captures every new Jotform submission, extracts key fields, and uses **OpenAI GPT-4.1** to classify sentiment and root cause.  

- **Negative feedback or ratings ‚â§3:** Generates a recovery email, logs it in Google Sheets, and alerts your CX team on Slack.  
- **Positive or neutral feedback:** Sends a personalized thank-you email with a link to leave a public review.  

All submissions are stored in Google Sheets for analytics and performance tracking.

---

### How to set up  
1. Visit [Jotform](https://www.jotform.com/?partner=aayushmansharma) and **sign up** (if you‚Äôre new) or **log in** to your existing account.  
2. Click your **profile icon (top-right)** ‚Üí go to **Settings**.  
3. In the left sidebar, open the **API** section.  
4. Click **Create New Key**.  
5. Set permission to **Full Access** (recommended for full workflow functionality).  
6. Copy the generated API key.  
7. In **n8n**, open **Credentials ‚Üí Create New ‚Üí JotForm API**.  
8. Paste your API key and save it as `JotForm account`.  
9. Test the connection by running your **Jotform Trigger** node.

---


### Jotform Configuration Guide (for n8n Feedback Workflow)

Follow these steps to connect your Jotform to n8n:

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Create the Feedback Form
Build a form in Jotform with the following exact fields:
- Field Label - Field Type - Example Input
- Full Name - Short Text - Customer Name
- Email - Email - test@gmail.com
- Whatsapp Number -  Short Text- 91xxxxxxxxxx
- Order Id - Short Text - #2321
- Ratings - Ratings - 3
- Please describe your experience in detail. - Long Text - ‚ÄúFeedback‚Äù
- Would you recommend us to others? - Single Choice (Yes/No) - No

üí° **Tip:** Keep field labels identical ‚Äî n8n uses these exact keys for data mapping.




---

### Requirements  
- Jotform API key (Full Access)  
- OpenAI API key  
- SMTP or transactional email service  
- Google service account or Authenticate using Oauth2  
- Slack token

---

### How to customize  
You can easily adjust rating thresholds, AI prompts, or email templates to match your brand‚Äôs tone.  
The structure is modular ‚Äî no code changes needed, just edit nodes and re-deploy.

![image.png](fileId:2935)

values.content:
=You are a Customer Feedback Analysis AI.
Your job is to analyze raw customer feedback and produce structured, machine-readable insights.

Return a valid JSON object only, in the following exact format:

{
  "Sentiment": "Positive | Neutral | Negative",
  "RootCause": "short, human-readable explanation of the main reason behind the feedback",
  "RecoveryDirection": "concise, internal note suggesting what the company should do next",
  "RecoveryMessage": "optional draft message suggestion for the support team to consider (not to be sent automatically)"
}

Submission:
Rating: {{ $json.ratings }}
Experience: {{ $json.experienceFeedback }}
RecommendUs: {{ $json.recommendUs }}

Guidelines:
1. Be objective ‚Äî classify based on sentiment and tone, not rating alone.
2. Use "RootCause" to summarize the issue (e.g., ‚Äúlate delivery‚Äù, ‚Äúrude support‚Äù, ‚Äúconfusing checkout‚Äù).
3. Keep "RecoveryDirection" actionable (e.g., ‚Äúoffer compensation‚Äù, ‚Äúescalate to ops‚Äù, ‚Äúsend apology email‚Äù).
4. Keep "RecoveryMessage" short and generic (internal use only).
5. Never include markdown, explanations, or extra text outside the JSON object.

nodes.name: Check if Feedback is Negative or Rating ‚â§ 3

value.Submission Id: ={{ $('Prepare Data for Sheet & Notifications (Negative Path)').item.json["Submission Id"] }}

parameters.html:
=
Your Brand Name Team

Thank you, {{$json["Full Name"]}}!

We‚Äôre so glad you enjoyed your experience with us. Your feedback keeps our team motivated to do better every day.

Would you mind sharing your experience publicly? It helps other customers discover us and keeps our small team growing!

Leave a Review

Thanks again for being part of the Your Brand Name community üíô
‚Äî The Customer Experience Team

¬© 2025 Your Brand Name ‚Ä¢ Unsubscribe

parameters.content:
## üß† Workflow Summary

AI-driven automation that transforms every Jotform feedback submission into actionable customer engagement.

üü¢ Captures Feedback ‚Üí üß† Analyzes with GPT ‚Üí ‚öñÔ∏è Routes Path ‚Üí  
üìß Sends Email ‚Üí üìä Logs Data ‚Üí üîî Notifies Team

**Built using:**  
Jotform + n8n + GPT-4.1 + Google Sheets + Slack + SMTP

Get sample google sheet format: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/u/2/d/1YYmyQNTGSdBQcoHuUI1tnd081Nq-5FVcN8KWGLf0iK8/copy

## Clean Incoming Data

Normalizes raw Jotform fields into structured variables:

- Full Name  
- Email  
- WhatsApp Number  
- Order ID  
- Rating (1‚Äì5 scale)  
- Experience Feedback Text  
- Recommendation Response

Ensures consistent naming for downstream AI and routing nodes.

## AI Sentiment & Root Cause Detection

GPT analyzes the customer feedback and returns structured insight:

- **Sentiment:** Positive | Neutral | Negative  
- **Root Cause:** Short explanation of the main issue  
- **Recovery Direction:** Actionable next step for the business  
- **Recovery Message:** Optional internal note for CX team

**Output:** JSON-only (no markdown, no extra text)

## Path Routing Logic

Decision Node Logic:
- If **Sentiment = Negative** OR **Rating ‚â§ 3**
  ‚Üí Route to *Recovery Path*
- Else
  ‚Üí Route to *Appreciation Path*

This ensures negative experiences are handled immediately,  
while positive customers are nurtured for reviews.

## AI Recovery Message Composer

The AI crafts a personalized, empathetic message using the customer‚Äôs data.

**Context Used:**
- Name, Rating, Feedback, Root Cause, Recovery Direction  

**Output Format:**
```json
{
  "Email Body": "...",
  "Subject": "...",
  "Tone": "Friendly | Professional | Empathetic"
}
```
Keeps tone consistent with your brand and avoids overpromising.


---

### üö® **Negative Path (Steps 6‚Äì10)**
```markdown
## üö® Recovery Path Flow

Triggered for **Negative Sentiment** or **Rating ‚â§ 3**.

1Ô∏è‚É£ Log feedback in Google Sheets  
2Ô∏è‚É£ Send AI-crafted Recovery Email  
3Ô∏è‚É£ Notify CX Team via Slack  
4Ô∏è‚É£ Update Google Sheet ‚Äî ‚ÄúRecovery Message Sent: Yes‚Äù  

**Goal:**  
Acknowledge and recover customer trust quickly, while logging all actions for visibility.

## üåü Appreciation Path Flow

Triggered for **Positive** or **Neutral** feedback.

‚úÖ Sends personalized **Thank-you Email**  
‚úÖ Includes CTA to leave a **public review**  
‚úÖ Logs all data in Google Sheets  

**Objective:**  
Reinforce loyalty and convert satisfied customers into public advocates.

## üîê How to Get Your Jotform API Credentials

1. Visit [Jotform](https://www.jotform.com/?partner=aayushmansharma) and **sign up** (if you‚Äôre new) or **log in** to your existing account.  
2. Click your **profile icon (top-right)** ‚Üí go to **Settings**.  
3. In the left sidebar, open the **API** section.  
4. Click **Create New Key**.  
5. Set permission to **Full Access** (recommended for full workflow functionality).  
6. Copy the generated API key.  
7. In **n8n**, open **Credentials ‚Üí Create New ‚Üí JotForm API**.  
8. Paste your API key and save it as `JotForm account`.  
9. Test the connection by running your **Jotform Trigger** node.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Jotform Configuration Guide (for n8n Feedback Workflow)

Follow these steps to connect your Jotform to n8n:

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Create the Feedback Form
Build a form in Jotform with the following exact fields:
- Field Label - Field Type - Example Input
- Full Name - Short Text - Customer Name
- Email - Email - test@gmail.com
- Whatsapp Number -  Short Text- 91xxxxxxxxxx
- Order Id - Short Text - #2321
- Ratings - Ratings - 3
- Please describe your experience in detail. - Long Text - ‚ÄúFeedback‚Äù
- Would you recommend us to others? - Single Choice (Yes/No) - No

üí° **Tip:** Keep field labels identical ‚Äî n8n uses these exact keys for data mapping.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
